title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3332/93 of 1 December 1993 concerning the stopping of fishing for sprat by vessels flying the flag of Denmark
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3332/93 of 1 December 1993 concerning the stopping of fishing for sprat by vessels flying the flag of Denmark
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Catches of sprat in the waters of ICES division III a by vessels flying the flag of Denmark or registered in Denmark are deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to Denmark for 1993.
Fishing for sprat in the waters of ICES division III a by vessels flying the flag of Denmark or registered in Denmark is prohibited, as well as the retention on board, the transhipment and the landing of such stock captured by the abovementioned vessels  after the date of application of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 15 November 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 December 1993.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 207, 29. 7. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 306, 11. 11. 1988, p. 2.
(3) OJ No L 397, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 285, 20. 11. 1993, p. 1.
